title: The Big Bang
episode_desc: Broke and low on options, Earn seeks to enter the music industry, by offering to be a manager for his rapper cousin, Paper Boi.
show_desc: Based in Atlanta, Earn and his cousin Alfred try to make their way in the world through the rap scene. Along the way they come face to face with social and economic issues touching on race, relationships, poverty, status, and parenthood.
